text: Grubhub Inc. is an American online and mobile prepared food and delivery group. It allows people to buy food from local restaurants. The company is based in Chicago, Illinois and was founded in 2004. As of 2019, the company had 19.9 million active users and 115,000 associated restaurants across 3,200 cities and all 50 states in the United States.Cauliflower pizza was the No. 1 Grubhub order in America in 2019–here’s what won in every state Grubhub Seamless went public in April 2014 and is traded on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under the ticker symbol "GRUB". On June 9, 2020, Just Eat Takeaway, a European food delivery service, announced an agreement to buy Grubhub for $7.3 billion in stock. ==Related pages== * DoorDash * Uber Eats ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Companies based in Chicago Category:2000s establishments in Illinois Category:2004 establishments in the United States
title: Grubhub
